body_content.explanation: Someone who is unchristened has not officially been made a member of the Christian Church in a service of baptism (= a ceremony in which water is put on someone's head or they are put under water for a short time):
examples: Paying his initial visits around the parish, he found a couple with an unchristened child.

body_content.explanation: not yet formally given a name:
examples: The baby rhino, as yet unchristened, was born at the zoo a week ago.
